mapper.update:
UPDATE tty_sys_tab_tree set
SYS_PERMISSION = #{sysPermission},
TAB_TITLE = #{tabTitle},
TAB_URL = #{tabUrl},
TAB_FLAG = #{tabFlag},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
ext_num1 = #{extNum1},
ext_num2 = #{extNum2},
ext_num3 = #{extNum3},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
